text: In applying and construing this chapter, consideration shall be given to the need to promote uniformity of the law with respect to its subject matter among states that enact it.
historical:
Legislative History of Laws

For Law 16-25, see notes following ยง 42-1231.

Uniform Law

This section is based upon ยง 6 of the Uniform Real Property Electronic Recording Act. See 7B, Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition, or ULA Database on Westlaw.
